original: ** There seems to be a nasty bug infestation! **
zh_trans: ** 看起来这里害虫横行！ **

original: ** Luckily bugs tend to dislike bright lights! **
zh_trans: ** 幸运的是这些虫子不喜欢亮光 **

original: ** WE CAN'T SEEM TO PROGRESS AHEAD... **
zh_trans: ** 我们好像被困在这了... **

original: ** HOLD UNTIL WE FIGURE SOMETHING OUT! **
zh_trans: ** 守住这里直到发生什么 **

original: ** THE WINDOW! GET ON IT! **
zh_trans: **  窗户碎了！快走！ **

original: ** We need to make the door move! **
zh_trans: ** 我们需要打开笼子上面的门!**

original: ** It looks as if it would probably open if we get the wheel moving... **
zh_trans: ** 如果我们转动仓鼠轮上面的门就可能会打开（在轮子里对着门口按s或背对着按w） **

original: ** GET GOING! WE HAVE ENOUGH KINETIC ENERGY! **
zh_trans: ** 快走！我们已经有足够的动能！ **

original: ** THE TOP DOOR IS OPENING 5 SECONDS! **
zh_trans: ** 头顶的门5秒后打开! **

original: ** Something spooky seems to be going on that table! **
zh_trans: ** 桌子上好像有奇奇怪怪的东西! **

original: ** We need to reach the top! **
zh_trans: ** 我们得爬到桌子上面! **

original: ** The seance is beginning and the spirits are calling... **
zh_trans: ** 降神会开始了，开始召唤鬼魂... **

original: ** The spirits marked the 'H' leter... **
zh_trans: ** 鬼魂标记了字母'H'... **

original: ** 'L' again... **
** 'E' yet again... **
** It spelled 'HALLOWEEN'! **
zh_trans: ** 它拼起来就是'HALLOWEEN'! **

original: ** Who would have guessed? **
zh_trans: ** 这谁能想得到呢? **

original: ** Something is happening! **
zh_trans: ** 有什么事情要发生了! **

original: ** Get on the lamp! Quick! The spell might not last long! **
zh_trans: ** 跳到吊灯上面！快！咒语可能不会持续太久 **

original: ** There is some screaking sound in the distance - maybe something is lurking in the darkness! **
zh_trans: ** 远处有尖叫声 - 也许黑暗中藏着什么东西 **

original: ** Try to get that old toy going! We must get out of here! **
zh_trans: ** 试着让这个小火车动起来！我们必须离开这里（拉杆要拉七下，第六下的时候老鼠会被放出来） **

original: ** OOOAAAAAAAAAAAAH! The darn thing almost squashed us! **
zh_trans: ** OOOAAAAAAAAAAAAH! 这玩意差点把我们压成肉饼! **

original: ** Being up here the reasonable way to solve the situation would be to go for a swim... If you know what I mean! **
zh_trans: ** 解决现在这种情况的最好方法是游泳...如果你能明白我的意思 **

original: ** We're getting close! If we can get into the pumpkin besides the oven we will be safe! **
zh_trans: ** 我们快到了! 如果我们能把烤箱边上的大南瓜炸掉就安全了 **

original: ** We should inspect that giant pumpkin sitting on the stool! **
zh_trans: ** 我们要检查下大南瓜! **

original: ** THAT'S IT! WE'RE GONNA BLOW IT UP! **
zh_trans: ** 就是这样！我们要把它炸掉！ **

original: ** HOLD AND STAY AFFAR UNTIL THE C4 CHARGE GOES OFF! **
zh_trans: ** 守住这里直到c4爆炸! **

original: ** MOVE! THE DARN THING IS OUT OF THE WAY! **
zh_trans: ** 撤退！路在这边！**

original: ** MS. WHISKERS HAS WHISKED US! IT'S ALL OVER! **
zh_trans: ** 大老鼠把我们的火车撞翻了！我们被淦爆了！**

original: ** We can't get past here with that stove turned on! **
zh_trans: ** 我们没法从开着的燃气灶走过去 **

original: ** What can we do? **
zh_trans: ** 我们能做什么? **

original: ** The gas counter! If we mess it up the gas might stop flowing - perhaps? **
zh_trans: ** 打计数器! 如果我们能把它打爆应该就可以通过燃气灶了（对红点中间的位置开枪） **

original: ** WELL DONE! THE GAS SHOULD STOP RUNNING ANY TIME SOON! **
zh_trans: ** 干得好！燃气很快就会停了 **

original: ** The metal is still hot - KEEP RESISTING! **
zh_trans: ** 灶台还是很热，还不能过去 - 继续防守! **

original: ** NOW! GET MOVING! **
zh_trans: ** 就是现在!撤退！ **

original: ** This seems to be a dead end! HOLD UNTIL SOMETHING HAPPENS! **
zh_trans: ** 这好像是死胡同! 守住这里直到发生什么事情! **

original: ** Nothing yet... KEEP IT UP! **
zh_trans: ** 还不到时候... 继续防守! **

original: ** We need to resist... Something must open! **
zh_trans: ** 我们还需要防守！ 一定会发生什么东西的! **

original: ** Will we be here forever? Have the mapmakers left us at our stake?! That can't be! **
zh_trans: ** 我们会永远困在这里吗？地图作者要把我们留在这了吗？！这不可能！**

original: ** It looks like this Halloween will be the end... of it all... **
zh_trans: ** 看来这个万圣节也就这样了...**

original: ** Hey look! It's Billy the friendly ghost! **
zh_trans: ** 快看! 是友善的幽灵比利! **

original: ** The tell tale is told to tell that Billy turns spooky things stale! Zombies will become vulnerable! **
zh_trans: ** 比利会腐化所有恐怖的东西! 僵尸将会变得很脆弱!（注意人类没有防抓） **

original: ** And thus Billy the friendly ghost removed all spooky things from the world **
zh_trans: ** 于是，友好的幽灵比利把世界上所有恐怖的东西都抹除了 **
